title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prokaryotic Expression System, T7 Polymerase,trc Promoter,araB expression system, Bacillus expression system. Eukaryotic Expression System, Expression in yeast, Cytomegalovirus Promoter system, Inducible mammalian expression system, Viral expression System. Expression in Insect, Baculovirus expression system. Transgenic Expression System, Expression in transgenic mice, expression of recombinant protein in milk of transgenic animals, Expression in transgenic plants
